column4: HI -- I have grub2 installed but ubuntu kernel udpates do not update grub.cfg -- just the old menu.lst.  What should I do?
grub2 doesn't use menu.lst, grub.cfg is auto-generated
udpate-grub does not update grub.cfg -- it updates menu.lst which is not used by grub2
yes!  grub legacy won't boot my machine
rm the menu.lst file, try again: sudo update-grub
I got the message: "Could not find /boot/grub/menu.lst file. Would you like /boot/grub/menu.lst generated for you? (y/N)"
works fine -- do you want to see the whole thing?
no, does the file show grub.cfg?
yet grub2 is booting my machine!
